title: New: Blanche – Sunday
body:
With one of the finest artworks of the year, LA’s **Blanche** standout from the crowd with their debut single, _Sunday_.

Sounding like a collaboration between a ‘blog-buzz’ producer, and a ‘blog-buzz’ vocalist, which it probably is; there’s hints of the likes of GEMS and Stefaloo alongside Slow Magic or XXYYXX. You know, the cool stuff. So it’s early days, and the beat perhaps becomes a little all consuming at times, drowning out the vocals, but there’s certainly a huge amount of potential here from **Blanche**. Check out Sunday below.

Sounding like a collaboration between a ‘blog-buzz’ producer, and a ‘blog-buzz’ vocalist, which it probably is; there’s hints of the likes of GEMS and Stefaloo alongside Slow Magic or XXYYXX. You know, the cool stuff. \[…\]
